collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (44 total Queries, 44 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>1</b>', '<b>Basis of Preparation</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.16', '1.1', 'Is there an explicit and unreserved statement that these financial statements have been prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards, or have the disclosures noted in point 2 below been given?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>2</b>', '<b>True and Fair Override</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.20 (a) to (d) ', '2.1', 'When the entity departs from a requirement of an IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC due to those charged with governance believing that it is necessary to show a true and fair view, have the following disclosures been made: <ol type=\"a\"> <li>that management has concluded that the financial statements present fairly the entity’s financial position, financial performance and cash flows;</li> <li>that the entity has complied with IFRS, except that it has departed from a particular requirement to achieve a fair presentation;</li> <li>the title of the IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC from which the entity has departed;</li> <li>the nature of the departure, including: <ul> <li>the treatment that would have been required; </li> <li>the reason why that treatment would be misleading; </li> <li>the treatment actually adopted; and</li> <li>for each period presented, the financial effect of the departure on each item in the financial statements that would have been reported in complying with the requirement?</li> </ul> </li> </ol>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.21', '2.2', 'When the entity has departed from a requirement an IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC in a prior period, and that departure affects the amounts recognised in the current period, have the disclosures set out in 2.1(c) and (d) above been given?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.23', '2.3', 'In the extremely rare circumstance where management conclude that a departure from an IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC is necessary to give a true and fair view, however, the relevant regulatory framework prohibits such as departure, have the following disclosures been given: <ul> <li>The title of the IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC;</li> <li>The nature of the requirement;</li> <li>The reason why management has concluded that complying with that requirement conflicts with the requirement to give a true and fair view; and </li> <li>For each period presented, the adjustments to each item in the financial statements that management has concluded necessary to achieve a fair presentation?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best Practice', '2.4', 'Is the effect and reason for any departure from any of the following accounting concepts disclosed: <ul> <li>Going concern;</li> <li>Consistency;</li> <li>Prudence;</li> <li>Accruals; and</li> <li>Determination of aggregate amounts by separate determination of each individual asset and liability?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>3</b>', '<b>Long and Short Accounting Periods</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.36', '3.1', 'Where the financial statements are for a period other than one year (i.e. there is a long or short accounting period) are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>That fact;</li> <li>The reason for having a longer or shorter period; and</li> <li>The fact that comparative amounts presented in the financial statements (including the related notes) are not entirely comparable?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>4</b>', '<b>Going Concern</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('ISA 570, 17-1', '4.1', 'Whilst not a specific requirement of IFRS, it is desirable to disclose the period that those charged with governance have considered when assessing going concern, where necessary have appropriate disclosures been given?\r\n<p>ISA 570 requires this period to be disclosed in the auditors’ report if it is less than one year from the end of the reporting period, and this has not been noted in the financial statements.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.25', '4.2', 'When management are aware, in making their assessment of going concern, of material uncertainties related to events or conditions that cast significant doubt upon the entity’s ability to continue as a going concern, have those uncertainties been disclosed?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.25', '4.3', 'When management do not prepare financial statements on a going concern basis (i.e. break up basis), are the following disclosures given: <ul> <li>That fact;</li> <li>The basis on which the financial statements are prepared; and </li> <li>The reason why the entity is not considered to be going concern?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>5</b>', '<b>Accounting Policies – General</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.117', '5.1', 'Is there a description of all significant accounting policies?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '5.2 ', '<b>First time adoption of IFRS 9 / 15 / 16</b>\r\n<p>Where applicable, have supplementary checklist Ab4g “ <b>Additional Disclosures on transition to IFRS 15 and IFRS 9</b>” and / or Ab4h, “ <b>Additional disclosures on transition to IFRS 16 </b>” been completed to ensure that the appropriate disclosures have been given? </p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>6</b>', '<b>Change in Accounting Policies</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8.28 (a) to (h) IAS 7.47 ', '6.1', 'When initial application of an IFRS has an effect on the current period or any prior period, or might have an effect on future periods, has the entity disclosed: <ul> <li>The title of the IFRS;</li> <li>Where applicable, that the change in accounting policy is made in accordance with its transitional provisions;</li> <li>The nature of the change in accounting policy;</li> <li>Where applicable, a description of the transitional provisions;</li> <li>Where applicable, the transitional provisions that might have an effects on future periods;</li> <li>For the current and each prior period presented, to the extent practicable, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including, lines in the statement of cash flows);</li> <li>The amount of the adjustment relating to periods before those presented, to the extent practicable; and </li> <li>If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</li> </ul> <p>NB: This disclosure does not need to be repeated in subsequent periods.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8,29 (a) to (e) IAS 7.49', '6.2', 'Where a voluntary change in accounting policy has affected the current period or any prior period, has the entity disclosed: <ul> <li>The nature of the change in accounting policy;</li> <li>The reasons why applying the new accounting policy provides reliable and more relevant information;</li> <li>To the extent practicable, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including lines in the Statement of Cash Flows); shown separately: <ul> <li>For the current period;</li> <li>For each prior period presented; and</li> <li>In aggregate for the periods before those presented.</li> </ul> </li> <li>If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</li> </ul> <p>NB: This disclosure does not need to be repeated in subsequent periods.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>7</b>', '<b>Impact of IFRS That Have Been Issued but Which are Not Yet Effective</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8.30 IAS 8.30 ', '7.1', 'When an entity has not applied a new IFRS that has been issued but is not yet effective, have the following been disclosed:- <ul> <li>That fact; and</li> <li>Known or reasonable estimable information relevant to assessing the possible impact that application of the new IFRS will have on the entity’s financial statements in the period of initial application.</li> </ul> <p>When giving the above disclosures an entity should consider, disclosing:-</p> <ul> <li>The title of the new IFRS;</li> <li>The nature of the impending change or changes in accounting policy;</li> <li>The date by which application of the IFRS is required;</li> <li>The date when the entity plans to apply the IFRS initially; and</li> <li>Either: <ul> <li>A discussion of the impact that initial application of the IFRS is expected to have on the entity’s financial statements; or</li> <li>If that impact is not known or reasonably estimable, a statement to that effect.</li> </ul> </li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>8</b>', '<b>Change in Presentation and Classification.</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.41 IAS 1.42 ', '8.1', 'When the presentation or classification of items in the financial statements has changed, has the entity reclassified comparative amounts (including as at the beginning of the preceding period) unless the reclassification is impracticable? <p>When comparative amounts have been reclassified, has the entity disclosed the following:</p> <ul> <li>The nature of the reclassification;</li> <li>The amount of each item or class of items that is reclassified; and</li> <li>The reason for the reclassification.</li> </ul> <p>If it is impracticable to reclassify comparative amounts, has it been disclosed why reclassification was not practicable?</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>9</b>', '<b>Change in Estimation Technique</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8.39 IAS 8.40', '9.1', 'Where there has been a change in estimation technique, has the nature of the change and the effect on the current period and future periods (where it is practicable) been disclosed? <p>Regarding future periods, if the effect is impracticable to quantify has this been disclosed?</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>10</b>', '<b>Correction of Material Prior Period Errors </b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8.49 (a), (b)(i), (c), (d) ', '10.1', 'Where a material prior period error has occurred, have the following been disclosed: <ul> <li>The nature of the prior period error;</li> <li>For each period presented, to the extent practicable, the amount of the correction for each financial statement line affected;</li> <li>To the extent practicable, the amount of the correction at the beginning of the earliest period presented; and</li> <li>An explanation where it is not practicable to give the above information, including the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the error has been corrected?</li> </ul> <p>NB: This disclosure does not need to be repeated in subsequent period.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11</b>', '<b>Specific Accounting Policies</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11.1</b>', '<b>Revenue Recognition </b> <br>Has an appropriate accounting policy for revenue recognition been disclosed? \r\n<p>For more detail, see question 3 “Revenue from Contracts with Customers” in Section 4: Statement of Comprehensive Income (SCI) and Related Notes.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best Practice', '<b>11.2</b>', '<b>Exceptional Items</b> <br>Has an accounting policy for the accounting treatment of exceptional items been noted?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.118 (a), (b)', '<b>11.3</b>', '<b>Intangible Assets (including R&D)</b> <p>Are the following disclosed for each class of intangible asset:</p> <ul> <li>Whether they have indefinite or finite lives;</li> <li>Where lives are finite; either the useful lives or the amortisation rates use; and </li> <li>The amortised method used for assets with finite lives?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.73 (a) to (c) ', '<b>11.4</b>', '<b>Property, Plant and Equipment (PPE)</b> <p>Has an accounting policy been given for each class of PPE regarding:</p> <ul> <li>The measurement bases used for determining the gross carrying amounts;</li> <li>The depreciation method used; and</li> <li>The useful lives or the depreciation rate used?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.75 (a) to (c) IAS 40.79 (a) to (b)', '<b>11.5</b>', '<b>Investment Properties</b> <p>Has an accounting policy been given which notes:</p> <ul> <li>Whether the cost or fair value model has been applied;</li> <li>Where the fair value model has been applied, whether, and in what circumstances, property interests held under an operating lease are classified and accounted for an investment properties;</li> <li>Where the classification is difficult, the criteria the entity uses to distinguish between: <ul> <li>investment properties;</li> <li>owner-occupied properties; and</li> <li>properties held for sale in the ordinary course of the business; and</li> </ul> </li> <li>Where the cost model has been applied: the depreciation method used and the useful lives or the depreciation rate used?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 20.39 (a)', '<b>11.6</b>', '<b>Government Grants</b> <br>Is there and accounting policy, including the method of presentation adopted in the financial statement disclosed?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 2.36 (a)', '<b>11.7</b>', '<b>Inventory</b> <br>Has the accounting policy adopted in measuring inventories, including the cost formula used, been disclosed?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11.8</b>', '<b>Foreign Currency Translation</b> <br>Has an accounting policy been given, which comprehensively covers foreign currency issues. This should specifically cover the method of translation of sums originally denominated in foreign currencies.', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11.9</b>', '<b>Investments in Subsidiaries, Associates and Joint Ventures</b> <p>Has the method of accounting for:</p> <ul> <li>Subsidiaries;</li> <li>Associates; and</li> <li>Joint ventures;</li> </ul> <p>in the entity’s own balance sheet (as opposed to any consolidated balance sheet which has been presented) been disclosed?</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 7.21 IAS 1.117 IFRS 7.B5 ', '<b>11.10</b>', '<b>Financial Instruments</b> <p>Has a summary been given of the significant accounting policies and the measurement bases used to value financial instruments?</p> <p>Such disclosure may include:</p> <ul> <li>for financial liabilities designated as at FVTPL: <ul> <li>the nature of the financial liabilities the entity has designated as at fair value through profit or loss;</li> <li>the criteria for so designating such financial liabilities on initial recognition; and</li> <li>how the entity has satisfied the conditions in paragraph 4.2.2 of IFRS 9 for such designation.</li> </ul> </li> <li>for financial assets designated as measured at FVTPL: <ul> <li>the nature of the financial assets the entity has designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss; and</li> <li>how the entity has satisfied the criteria in paragraph 4.1.5 of IFRS 9 for such designation.</li> </ul> </li> <li>whether regular way purchases and sales of financial assets are accounted for at trade date or at settlement date (see paragraph 3.1.2 of IFRS 9).</li> <li>how net gains or net losses on each category of financial instrument are determined (see paragraph 20(a)), for example, whether the net gains or net losses on items at fair value through profit or loss include interest or dividend income.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11.11</b>', '<b>Deferred Taxation</b> <br>Is there an appropriate accounting policy?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 7.46', '<b>11.12</b>', '<b>Cash and Cash Equivalents</b> <br>Has the policy which is adopted in determining the composition of cash and cash equivalents been disclosed?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.51', '<b>11.13</b>', '<b>Entity is a Lessee</b> <br>Has an appropriate policy for accounting for leases for which the entity is a lessee been given, sufficient to enable users of the financial statements to understand the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the entity? \r\n<p>For more detail, see question 13 “Entity is a Lessee” in Section 6 – Statement of Financial Position and Related Notes.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.89', '<b>11.14</b>', '<b>Entity is a Lessor</b> <br>Has an appropriate policy for accounting for leases for which the entity is a lessor been given, sufficient to enable users of the financial statements to understand the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the entity? \r\n<p>For more detail, see questions 14 “Entity is a Lessor: Finance Leases” and question 15 “Entity is a Lessor: Operating Leases” in Section 6 – Statement of Financial Position and Related Notes.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.16', '1.1', 'Is there an explicit and unreserved statement that these financial statements have been prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards, or have the disclosures noted in point 2 below been given?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>2</b>', '<b>True and Fair Override</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.20 (a) to (d) ', '2.1', 'When the entity departs from a requirement of an IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC due to those charged with governance believing that it is necessary to show a true and fair view, have the following disclosures been made: <ol type=\"a\"> <li>that management has concluded that the financial statements present fairly the entity’s financial position, financial performance and cash flows;</li> <li>that the entity has complied with IFRS, except that it has departed from a particular requirement to achieve a fair presentation;</li> <li>the title of the IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC from which the entity has departed;</li> <li>the nature of the departure, including: <ul> <li>the treatment that would have been required; </li> <li>the reason why that treatment would be misleading; </li> <li>the treatment actually adopted; and</li> <li>for each period presented, the financial effect of the departure on each item in the financial statements that would have been reported in complying with the requirement?</li> </ul> </li> </ol>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.21', '2.2', 'When the entity has departed from a requirement an IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC in a prior period, and that departure affects the amounts recognised in the current period, have the disclosures set out in 2.1(c) and (d) above been given?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.23', '2.3', 'In the extremely rare circumstance where management conclude that a departure from an IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC is necessary to give a true and fair view, however, the relevant regulatory framework prohibits such as departure, have the following disclosures been given: <ul> <li>The title of the IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC;</li> <li>The nature of the requirement;</li> <li>The reason why management has concluded that complying with that requirement conflicts with the requirement to give a true and fair view; and </li> <li>For each period presented, the adjustments to each item in the financial statements that management has concluded necessary to achieve a fair presentation?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best Practice', '2.4', 'Is the effect and reason for any departure from any of the following accounting concepts disclosed: <ul> <li>Going concern;</li> <li>Consistency;</li> <li>Prudence;</li> <li>Accruals; and</li> <li>Determination of aggregate amounts by separate determination of each individual asset and liability?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>3</b>', '<b>Long and Short Accounting Periods</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.36', '3.1', 'Where the financial statements are for a period other than one year (i.e. there is a long or short accounting period) are the following disclosed: <ul> <li>That fact;</li> <li>The reason for having a longer or shorter period; and</li> <li>The fact that comparative amounts presented in the financial statements (including the related notes) are not entirely comparable?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>4</b>', '<b>Going Concern</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('ISA 570, 17-1', '4.1', 'Whilst not a specific requirement of IFRS, it is desirable to disclose the period that those charged with governance have considered when assessing going concern, where necessary have appropriate disclosures been given?\r\n<p>ISA 570 requires this period to be disclosed in the auditors’ report if it is less than one year from the end of the reporting period, and this has not been noted in the financial statements.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.25', '4.2', 'When management are aware, in making their assessment of going concern, of material uncertainties related to events or conditions that cast significant doubt upon the entity’s ability to continue as a going concern, have those uncertainties been disclosed?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.25', '4.3', 'When management do not prepare financial statements on a going concern basis (i.e. break up basis), are the following disclosures given: <ul> <li>That fact;</li> <li>The basis on which the financial statements are prepared; and </li> <li>The reason why the entity is not considered to be going concern?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>5</b>', '<b>Accounting Policies – General</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.117', '5.1', 'Is there a description of all significant accounting policies?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '5.2 ', '<b>First time adoption of IFRS 9 / 15 / 16</b>\r\n<p>Where applicable, have supplementary checklist Ab4g “ <b>Additional Disclosures on transition to IFRS 15 and IFRS 9</b>” and / or Ab4h, “ <b>Additional disclosures on transition to IFRS 16 </b>” been completed to ensure that the appropriate disclosures have been given? </p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>6</b>', '<b>Change in Accounting Policies</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8.28 (a) to (h) IAS 7.47 ', '6.1', 'When initial application of an IFRS has an effect on the current period or any prior period, or might have an effect on future periods, has the entity disclosed: <ul> <li>The title of the IFRS;</li> <li>Where applicable, that the change in accounting policy is made in accordance with its transitional provisions;</li> <li>The nature of the change in accounting policy;</li> <li>Where applicable, a description of the transitional provisions;</li> <li>Where applicable, the transitional provisions that might have an effects on future periods;</li> <li>For the current and each prior period presented, to the extent practicable, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including, lines in the statement of cash flows);</li> <li>The amount of the adjustment relating to periods before those presented, to the extent practicable; and </li> <li>If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</li> </ul> <p>NB: This disclosure does not need to be repeated in subsequent periods.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8,29 (a) to (e) IAS 7.49', '6.2', 'Where a voluntary change in accounting policy has affected the current period or any prior period, has the entity disclosed: <ul> <li>The nature of the change in accounting policy;</li> <li>The reasons why applying the new accounting policy provides reliable and more relevant information;</li> <li>To the extent practicable, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including lines in the Statement of Cash Flows); shown separately: <ul> <li>For the current period;</li> <li>For each prior period presented; and</li> <li>In aggregate for the periods before those presented.</li> </ul> </li> <li>If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</li> </ul> <p>NB: This disclosure does not need to be repeated in subsequent periods.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>7</b>', '<b>Impact of IFRS That Have Been Issued but Which are Not Yet Effective</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8.30 IAS 8.30 ', '7.1', 'When an entity has not applied a new IFRS that has been issued but is not yet effective, have the following been disclosed:- <ul> <li>That fact; and</li> <li>Known or reasonable estimable information relevant to assessing the possible impact that application of the new IFRS will have on the entity’s financial statements in the period of initial application.</li> </ul> <p>When giving the above disclosures an entity should consider, disclosing:-</p> <ul> <li>The title of the new IFRS;</li> <li>The nature of the impending change or changes in accounting policy;</li> <li>The date by which application of the IFRS is required;</li> <li>The date when the entity plans to apply the IFRS initially; and</li> <li>Either: <ul> <li>A discussion of the impact that initial application of the IFRS is expected to have on the entity’s financial statements; or</li> <li>If that impact is not known or reasonably estimable, a statement to that effect.</li> </ul> </li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>8</b>', '<b>Change in Presentation and Classification.</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 1.41 IAS 1.42 ', '8.1', 'When the presentation or classification of items in the financial statements has changed, has the entity reclassified comparative amounts (including as at the beginning of the preceding period) unless the reclassification is impracticable? <p>When comparative amounts have been reclassified, has the entity disclosed the following:</p> <ul> <li>The nature of the reclassification;</li> <li>The amount of each item or class of items that is reclassified; and</li> <li>The reason for the reclassification.</li> </ul> <p>If it is impracticable to reclassify comparative amounts, has it been disclosed why reclassification was not practicable?</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>9</b>', '<b>Change in Estimation Technique</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8.39 IAS 8.40', '9.1', 'Where there has been a change in estimation technique, has the nature of the change and the effect on the current period and future periods (where it is practicable) been disclosed? <p>Regarding future periods, if the effect is impracticable to quantify has this been disclosed?</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>10</b>', '<b>Correction of Material Prior Period Errors </b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 8.49 (a), (b)(i), (c), (d) ', '10.1', 'Where a material prior period error has occurred, have the following been disclosed: <ul> <li>The nature of the prior period error;</li> <li>For each period presented, to the extent practicable, the amount of the correction for each financial statement line affected;</li> <li>To the extent practicable, the amount of the correction at the beginning of the earliest period presented; and</li> <li>An explanation where it is not practicable to give the above information, including the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the error has been corrected?</li> </ul> <p>NB: This disclosure does not need to be repeated in subsequent period.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11</b>', '<b>Specific Accounting Policies</b>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11.1</b>', '<b>Revenue Recognition </b> <br>Has an appropriate accounting policy for revenue recognition been disclosed? \r\n<p>For more detail, see question 3 “Revenue from Contracts with Customers” in Section 4: Statement of Comprehensive Income (SCI) and Related Notes.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('Best Practice', '<b>11.2</b>', '<b>Exceptional Items</b> <br>Has an accounting policy for the accounting treatment of exceptional items been noted?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 38.118 (a), (b)', '<b>11.3</b>', '<b>Intangible Assets (including R&D)</b> <p>Are the following disclosed for each class of intangible asset:</p> <ul> <li>Whether they have indefinite or finite lives;</li> <li>Where lives are finite; either the useful lives or the amortisation rates use; and </li> <li>The amortised method used for assets with finite lives?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 16.73 (a) to (c) ', '<b>11.4</b>', '<b>Property, Plant and Equipment (PPE)</b> <p>Has an accounting policy been given for each class of PPE regarding:</p> <ul> <li>The measurement bases used for determining the gross carrying amounts;</li> <li>The depreciation method used; and</li> <li>The useful lives or the depreciation rate used?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 40.75 (a) to (c) IAS 40.79 (a) to (b)', '<b>11.5</b>', '<b>Investment Properties</b> <p>Has an accounting policy been given which notes:</p> <ul> <li>Whether the cost or fair value model has been applied;</li> <li>Where the fair value model has been applied, whether, and in what circumstances, property interests held under an operating lease are classified and accounted for an investment properties;</li> <li>Where the classification is difficult, the criteria the entity uses to distinguish between: <ul> <li>investment properties;</li> <li>owner-occupied properties; and</li> <li>properties held for sale in the ordinary course of the business; and</li> </ul> </li> <li>Where the cost model has been applied: the depreciation method used and the useful lives or the depreciation rate used?</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 20.39 (a)', '<b>11.6</b>', '<b>Government Grants</b> <br>Is there and accounting policy, including the method of presentation adopted in the financial statement disclosed?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 2.36 (a)', '<b>11.7</b>', '<b>Inventory</b> <br>Has the accounting policy adopted in measuring inventories, including the cost formula used, been disclosed?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11.8</b>', '<b>Foreign Currency Translation</b> <br>Has an accounting policy been given, which comprehensively covers foreign currency issues. This should specifically cover the method of translation of sums originally denominated in foreign currencies.', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11.9</b>', '<b>Investments in Subsidiaries, Associates and Joint Ventures</b> <p>Has the method of accounting for:</p> <ul> <li>Subsidiaries;</li> <li>Associates; and</li> <li>Joint ventures;</li> </ul> <p>in the entity’s own balance sheet (as opposed to any consolidated balance sheet which has been presented) been disclosed?</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 7.21 IAS 1.117 IFRS 7.B5 ', '<b>11.10</b>', '<b>Financial Instruments</b> <p>Has a summary been given of the significant accounting policies and the measurement bases used to value financial instruments?</p> <p>Such disclosure may include:</p> <ul> <li>for financial liabilities designated as at FVTPL: <ul> <li>the nature of the financial liabilities the entity has designated as at fair value through profit or loss;</li> <li>the criteria for so designating such financial liabilities on initial recognition; and</li> <li>how the entity has satisfied the conditions in paragraph 4.2.2 of IFRS 9 for such designation.</li> </ul> </li> <li>for financial assets designated as measured at FVTPL: <ul> <li>the nature of the financial assets the entity has designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss; and</li> <li>how the entity has satisfied the criteria in paragraph 4.1.5 of IFRS 9 for such designation.</li> </ul> </li> <li>whether regular way purchases and sales of financial assets are accounted for at trade date or at settlement date (see paragraph 3.1.2 of IFRS 9).</li> <li>how net gains or net losses on each category of financial instrument are determined (see paragraph 20(a)), for example, whether the net gains or net losses on items at fair value through profit or loss include interest or dividend income.</li> </ul>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('', '<b>11.11</b>', '<b>Deferred Taxation</b> <br>Is there an appropriate accounting policy?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IAS 7.46', '<b>11.12</b>', '<b>Cash and Cash Equivalents</b> <br>Has the policy which is adopted in determining the composition of cash and cash equivalents been disclosed?', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.51', '<b>11.13</b>', '<b>Entity is a Lessee</b> <br>Has an appropriate policy for accounting for leases for which the entity is a lessee been given, sufficient to enable users of the financial statements to understand the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the entity? \r\n<p>For more detail, see question 13 “Entity is a Lessee” in Section 6 – Statement of Financial Position and Related Notes.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: INSERT INTO `tbl_c3` (`reference`, `extent`, `question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `type`, `code`, `c3tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('IFRS 16.89', '<b>11.14</b>', '<b>Entity is a Lessor</b> <br>Has an appropriate policy for accounting for leases for which the entity is a lessor been given, sufficient to enable users of the financial statements to understand the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the entity? \r\n<p>For more detail, see questions 14 “Entity is a Lessor: Finance Leases” and question 15 “Entity is a Lessor: Operating Leases” in Section 6 – Statement of Financial Position and Related Notes.</p>', '', '', 'section8', '3.15 Ab4', '59', 'Active', '2024-04-17 17:45:26')

session.name: Davies John
session.allowed:
stdClass Object
(
    [add] => Yes
    [edit] => Yes
    [acin] => Yes
    [clm] => Yes
    [cl] => Yes
    [sd] => Yes
    [audm] => Yes
    [aud] => Yes
    [frm] => Yes
    [sett] => Yes
    [dash] => Yes
)

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <b>Basis of Preparation</b>
    [1] => Is there an explicit and unreserved statement that these financial statements have been prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards, or have the disclosures noted in point 2 below been given?
    [2] => <b>True and Fair Override</b>
    [3] => When the entity departs from a requirement of an IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC due to those charged with governance believing that it is necessary to show a true and fair view, have the following disclosures been made:
<ol type="a">
    <li>that management has concluded that the financial statements present fairly the entity’s financial position, financial performance and cash flows;</li>
    <li>that the entity has complied with IFRS, except that it has departed from a particular requirement to achieve a fair presentation;</li>
    <li>the title of the IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC from which the entity has departed;</li>
    <li>the nature of the departure, including:
        <ul>
            <li>the treatment that would have been required; </li>
            <li>the reason why that treatment would be misleading; </li>
            <li>the treatment actually adopted; and</li>
            <li>for each period presented, the financial effect of the departure on each item in the financial statements that would have been reported in complying with the requirement?</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ol>
    [4] => When the entity has departed from a requirement an IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC in a prior period, and that departure affects the amounts recognised in the current period, have the disclosures set out in 2.1(c) and (d) above been given?
    [5] => In the extremely rare circumstance where management conclude that a departure from an IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC is necessary to give a true and fair view, however, the relevant regulatory framework prohibits such as departure, have the following disclosures been given:
<ul>
    <li>The title of the IAS / IFRS / SIC / IFRIC;</li>
    <li>The nature of the requirement;</li>
    <li>The reason why management has concluded that complying with that requirement conflicts with the requirement to give a true and fair view; and </li>
    <li>For each period presented, the adjustments to each item in the financial statements that management has concluded necessary to achieve a fair presentation?</li>
</ul>
    [6] => Is the effect and reason for any departure from any of the following accounting concepts disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>Going concern;</li>
    <li>Consistency;</li>
    <li>Prudence;</li>
    <li>Accruals; and</li>
    <li>Determination of aggregate amounts by separate determination of each individual asset and liability?</li>
</ul>
    [7] => <b>Long and Short Accounting Periods</b>
    [8] => Where the financial statements are for a period other than one year (i.e. there is a long or short accounting period) are the following disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>That fact;</li>
    <li>The reason for having a longer or shorter period; and</li>
    <li>The fact that comparative amounts presented in the financial statements (including the related notes) are not entirely comparable?</li>
</ul>
    [9] => <b>Going Concern</b>
    [10] => Whilst not a specific requirement of IFRS, it is desirable to disclose the period that those charged with governance have considered when assessing going concern, where necessary have appropriate disclosures been given?
<p>ISA 570 requires this period to be disclosed in the auditors’ report if it is less than one year from the end of the reporting period, and this has not been noted in the financial statements.</p>
    [11] => When management are aware, in making their assessment of going concern, of material uncertainties related to events or conditions that cast significant doubt upon the entity’s ability to continue as a going concern, have those uncertainties been disclosed?
    [12] => When management do not prepare financial statements on a going concern basis (i.e. break up basis), are the following disclosures given:
<ul>
    <li>That fact;</li>
    <li>The basis on which the financial statements are prepared; and </li>
    <li>The reason why the entity is not considered to be going concern?</li>
</ul>
    [13] => <b>Accounting Policies – General</b>
    [14] => Is there a description of all significant accounting policies?
    [15] => <b>First time adoption of IFRS 9 / 15 / 16</b>
<p>Where applicable, have supplementary checklist Ab4g “ <b>Additional Disclosures on transition to IFRS 15 and IFRS 9</b>” and / or Ab4h, “ <b>Additional disclosures on transition to IFRS 16 </b>” been completed to ensure that the appropriate disclosures have been given? </p>
    [16] => <b>Change in Accounting Policies</b>
    [17] => When initial application of an IFRS has an effect on the current period or any prior period, or might have an effect on future periods, has the entity disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>The title of the IFRS;</li>
    <li>Where applicable, that the change in accounting policy is made in accordance with its transitional provisions;</li>
    <li>The nature of the change in accounting policy;</li>
    <li>Where applicable, a description of the transitional provisions;</li>
    <li>Where applicable, the transitional provisions that might have an effects on future periods;</li>
    <li>For the current and each prior period presented, to the extent practicable, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including, lines in the statement of cash flows);</li>
    <li>The amount of the adjustment relating to periods before those presented, to the extent practicable; and </li>
    <li>If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</li>
</ul>
<p>NB: This disclosure does not need to be repeated in subsequent periods.</p>
    [18] => Where a voluntary change in accounting policy has affected the current period or any prior period, has the entity disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>The nature of the change in accounting policy;</li>
    <li>The reasons why applying the new accounting policy provides reliable and more relevant information;</li>
    <li>To the extent practicable, the amount of the adjustment for each financial statement line item affected (including lines in the Statement of Cash Flows); shown separately:
        <ul>
            <li>For the current period;</li>
            <li>For each prior period presented; and</li>
            <li>In aggregate for the periods before those presented.</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li>If retrospective application is impracticable for a particular prior period, or for periods before those presented, the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the change in accounting policy has been applied?</li>
</ul>
<p>NB: This disclosure does not need to be repeated in subsequent periods.</p>
    [19] => <b>Impact of IFRS That Have Been Issued but Which are Not Yet Effective</b>
    [20] => When an entity has not applied a new IFRS that has been issued but is not yet effective, have the following been disclosed:-
<ul>
    <li>That fact; and</li>
    <li>Known or reasonable estimable information relevant to assessing the possible impact that application of the new IFRS will have on the entity’s financial statements in the period of initial application.</li>
</ul>
<p>When giving the above disclosures an entity should consider, disclosing:-</p>
<ul>
    <li>The title of the new IFRS;</li>
    <li>The nature of the impending change or changes in accounting policy;</li>
    <li>The date by which application of the IFRS is required;</li>
    <li>The date when the entity plans to apply the IFRS initially; and</li>
    <li>Either:
        <ul>
            <li>A discussion of the impact that initial application of the IFRS is expected to have on the entity’s financial statements; or</li>
            <li>If that impact is not known or reasonably estimable, a statement to that effect.</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
</ul>
    [21] => <b>Change in Presentation and Classification.</b>
    [22] => When the presentation or classification of items in the financial statements has changed, has the entity reclassified comparative amounts (including as at the beginning of the preceding period) unless the reclassification is impracticable?
<p>When comparative amounts have been reclassified, has the entity disclosed the following:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The nature of the reclassification;</li>
    <li>The amount of each item or class of items that is reclassified; and</li>
    <li>The reason for the reclassification.</li>
</ul>
<p>If it is impracticable to reclassify comparative amounts, has it been disclosed why reclassification was not practicable?</p>
    [23] => <b>Change in Estimation Technique</b>
    [24] => Where there has been a change in estimation technique, has the nature of the change and the effect on the current period and future periods (where it is practicable) been disclosed?
<p>Regarding future periods, if the effect is impracticable to quantify has this been disclosed?</p>
    [25] => <b>Correction of Material Prior Period Errors </b>
    [26] => Where a material prior period error has occurred, have the following been disclosed:
<ul>
    <li>The nature of the prior period error;</li>
    <li>For each period presented, to the extent practicable, the amount of the correction for each financial statement line affected;</li>
    <li>To the extent practicable, the amount of the correction at the beginning of the earliest period presented; and</li>
    <li>An explanation where it is not practicable to give the above information, including the circumstances that led to the existence of that condition and a description of how and from when the error has been corrected?</li>
</ul>
<p>NB: This disclosure does not need to be repeated in subsequent period.</p>
    [27] => <b>Specific Accounting Policies</b>
    [28] => <b>Revenue Recognition </b> <br>Has an appropriate accounting policy for revenue recognition been disclosed? 
<p>For more detail, see question 3 “Revenue from Contracts with Customers” in Section 4: Statement of Comprehensive Income (SCI) and Related Notes.</p>
    [29] => <b>Exceptional Items</b> <br>Has an accounting policy for the accounting treatment of exceptional items been noted?
    [30] => <b>Intangible Assets (including R&D)</b>
<p>Are the following disclosed for each class of intangible asset:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Whether they have indefinite or finite lives;</li>
    <li>Where lives are finite; either the useful lives or the amortisation rates use; and </li>
    <li>The amortised method used for assets with finite lives?</li>
</ul>
    [31] => <b>Property, Plant and Equipment (PPE)</b>
<p>Has an accounting policy been given for each class of PPE regarding:</p>
<ul>
    <li>The measurement bases used for determining the gross carrying amounts;</li>
    <li>The depreciation method used; and</li>
    <li>The useful lives or the depreciation rate used?</li>
</ul>
    [32] => <b>Investment Properties</b>
<p>Has an accounting policy been given which notes:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Whether the cost or fair value model has been applied;</li>
    <li>Where the fair value model has been applied, whether, and in what circumstances, property interests held under an operating lease are classified and accounted for an investment properties;</li>
    <li>Where the classification is difficult, the criteria the entity uses to distinguish between:
        <ul>
            <li>investment properties;</li>
            <li>owner-occupied properties; and</li>
            <li>properties held for sale in the ordinary course of the business; and</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li>Where the cost model has been applied: the depreciation method used and the useful lives or the depreciation rate used?</li>
</ul>
    [33] => <b>Government Grants</b> <br>Is there and accounting policy, including the method of presentation adopted in the financial statement disclosed?
    [34] => <b>Inventory</b> <br>Has the accounting policy adopted in measuring inventories, including the cost formula used, been disclosed?
    [35] => <b>Foreign Currency Translation</b> <br>Has an accounting policy been given, which comprehensively covers foreign currency issues.  This should specifically cover the method of translation of sums originally denominated in foreign currencies.
    [36] => <b>Investments in Subsidiaries, Associates and Joint Ventures</b>
<p>Has the method of accounting for:</p>
<ul>
    <li>Subsidiaries;</li>
    <li>Associates; and</li>
    <li>Joint ventures;</li>
</ul>
<p>in the entity’s own balance sheet (as opposed to any consolidated balance sheet which has been presented) been disclosed?</p>
    [37] => <b>Financial Instruments</b>
<p>Has a summary been given of the significant accounting policies and the measurement bases used to value financial instruments?</p>
<p>Such disclosure may include:</p>
<ul>
    <li>for financial liabilities designated as at FVTPL:
        <ul>
            <li>the nature of the financial liabilities the entity has designated as at fair value through profit or loss;</li>
            <li>the criteria for so designating such financial liabilities on initial recognition; and</li>
            <li>how the entity has satisfied the conditions in paragraph 4.2.2 of IFRS 9 for such designation.</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li>for financial assets designated as measured at FVTPL:
        <ul>
            <li>the nature of the financial assets the entity has designated as measured at fair value through profit or loss; and</li>
            <li>how the entity has satisfied the criteria in paragraph 4.1.5 of IFRS 9 for such designation.</li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li>whether regular way purchases and sales of financial assets are accounted for at trade date or at settlement date (see paragraph 3.1.2 of IFRS 9).</li>
    <li>how net gains or net losses on each category of financial instrument are determined (see paragraph 20(a)), for example, whether the net gains or net losses on items at fair value through profit or loss include interest or dividend income.</li>
</ul>
    [38] => <b>Deferred Taxation</b> <br>Is there an appropriate accounting policy?
    [39] => <b>Cash and Cash Equivalents</b> <br>Has the policy which is adopted in determining the composition of cash and cash equivalents been disclosed?
    [40] => <b>Entity is a Lessee</b> <br>Has an appropriate policy for accounting for leases for which the entity is a lessee been given, sufficient to enable users of the financial statements to understand the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the entity? 
<p>For more detail, see question 13 “Entity is a Lessee” in Section 6 – Statement of Financial Position and Related Notes.</p>
    [41] => <b>Entity is a Lessor</b> <br>Has an appropriate policy for accounting for leases for which the entity is a lessor been given, sufficient to enable users of the financial statements to understand the effect that leases have on the financial position, financial performance and cash flows of the entity? 
<p>For more detail, see questions 14 “Entity is a Lessor: Finance Leases” and question 15 “Entity is a Lessor: Operating Leases” in Section 6 – Statement of Financial Position and Related Notes.</p>
)
